io.sphere.internal.request

Interface RequestHolder<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TestableRequestHolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestHolderImpl

    public interface RequestHolder<T>
extends TestableRequestHolder
    Abstraction over HTTP request execution. Allows for mocking in tests.
